sentence.Network_en: He had sought work as a cowboy, rounding up cattle.
sentence.Network_cn: 他找了一份放牛的差事，负责把牛赶到一起。

sentence.Network_en: Fortunately, such cowboy firms are becoming rarer.
sentence.Network_cn: 幸运的是，这样的欺诈公司越来越少了。

sentence.Network_en: He wore frayed jeans and cowboy shirts.
sentence.Network_cn: 他穿着磨破的牛仔裤和牛仔衬衫。

entry.tran: (西部电影中的)牛仔，骑马牧人
entry.def: A cowboy is a male character in a western.

example.ex: Boys used to play at cowboys and Indians.
example.tran: 男孩们过去常玩西部牛仔与印第安人的游戏。

entry.tran: (尤指旧时北美的)牧牛工，牛仔
entry.def: A cowboy is a man employed to look after cattle in North America, especially in former times.

entry.tran: 奸商;粗心大意的商人;无经验的商人
entry.def: You can refer to someone who runs a business as a cowboy if they run it dishonestly or are not experienced, skilful, or careful in their work.

example.ex: We don't want to look like a bunch of cowboys...
example.tran: 我们不想看上去像一帮奸商。

example.ex: Fortunately, such cowboy firms are becoming rarer.
example.tran: 幸运的是，这样的欺诈公司越来越少了。

means.word_mean: 1. a hired hand who tends cattle and performs other duties on horseback
2. a performer who gives exhibitions of riding and roping and bulldogging
3. someone who is reckless or irresponsible (especially in driving vehicles)

auth_sentence.content: He was a cowboy, is a good description.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was a cowboy, is a good description.

auth_sentence.content: He wore a cowboy hat and carried a bullwhip.

auth_sentence.content: His scuffed cowboy boots cross my line of sight.

sentences.en: Cowboys do a roundup of cows.
The cowboy splashed his way across the shallow stream with his cow.
He traded a job in New York City for the life of a cowboy.
sentences.cn: 他放弃了在纽约的工作,去过牛仔生活。

sentences.en: Most westerns are about cowboys and Red Indians.
sentences.cn: 大多数美国西部电影都是关于牛仔和红色的印第安人的。

sentences.en: In the Wild West there were cowboys who used to hunt down any man with a price on his head.
sentences.cn: 在西大荒,牛仔们曾为得到悬赏而穷追任何要追捕的对象。

sentences.en: In his last film he starred as a cowboy.
sentences.cn: 他在其最后一部影片中担任主角,扮演一位牛仔。

sentences.en: There are too many cowboys in the business these days.
sentences.cn: 近来商界中，瞎吵胡闹的家伙太多。
